So I have no comment regarding the quality of the room but was very impressed by their commitment to the reservation. We arrived on a Saturday during their most important festival. I had booked the room 5 months before online at their own website without a credit card guarentee. They could have easily not acknowledged the booking or sent me off on my own but did not. They moved me without added cost to their 4 star hotel. That was nice!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel is exactly what you should get for a three star. Perfect location and a clean, nice room to lay your head. The hotel was central and walkable to many sights. Also, easy access to the metro. Staff was very friendly and spoke English. No complaints for the price. Of course it doesn´t have all the amenities of a deluxe hotel, but for a three star it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, comfortable -- will visit again!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for four nights at the end of June. The location of this hotel cannot be beat -- right in the historic city centre next to the cathedral. We were only a 10 to 15-minute walk away from the main shopping districts of the Gothic quarter, including the Boqueria market (a must see) on La Rambla, C. de Ferran and C. del Portal de L'Angel. The rooms were clean, quite large for European standards, and well-decorated. We had no concerns with noise, even though we stayed on the second floor, thanks to thick inner windows. Breakfast was quite nourishing but extra; there are several bars nearby with cheaper fare. Our only complaint was the lack of TV channels (3, all in Spanish), but hey -- one should be exploring Europe instead. The hotel staff are quite helpful and professional. All in all, we had a great stay and would return.

Reviews.Title: “Barca Fantastic!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sandy066
Reviews.Content: Just returned from 5 days at Regencia Colon. Fantastic location, on the 4th floor, good place to be, had a partial view of cathedral. A bit noisy due to some building work nearby, but after all the sight seeing and a few bottles of wine still managed a good nights sleep. If you like a brew in the mornings, bring a travel kettle as no tea/coffee facilities in room. Cleaned daily, with nice fluffly white towles provided. Hotel itself is friendly, clean, basic but provides everything you could want. Loved the city itself, great buildings, ironwork and large oak doors. Streets busy but noticeable clean. Large crossings everywhere but easy to get about. A good tip for you if doing a lot of sight seeing, book your travel bus/train pass via expedia, saves lots of hassle and gives you discounts into some attractions. Would definitiely go back to Barcelona, would recommend the Regencia.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: fsufan
Reviews.Content: The hotel has an excellent location, right next to the Cathedral and walking distance to several other tourist sites (Las Ramblas, Picasso museum, Barri Gotic area, Placa Catalunya) and metro stations. The staff was helpful, recommending restaurants and storing our luggage. Our room was very clean and spacious (we were given a triple, although there were two of us in the room) and clean. Agree with one of the previous reviews, there is some construction going on right now at night, making it very noisy. I am a heavy sleeper, so it didn't bother me. My roommate, however, had trouble sleeping. Other than that, would HIGHLY recommend this hotel. We found a rate of $124/night, so thought it was a great deal compared to other hotels in Europe we had at similar rates

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Spent a long time looking at hotels in Barcelona but finally booked the Regencia Colon after reading the good reviews on this site. It did not disappoint. Great location 30 metres from the Cathedral square - we even had a partial view of the Cathedral from our room. Clean, comfortable room, good size, friendly staff and great facilities within a very short walk. One of the main shopping streets is just round the corner in one direction, the gothic quarter, small shops, restaurants and cafes are just off the square in all other directions. It's not a style hotel and it doesn't have the facilities of a big hotel. But it is everything else that I hoped it would be. I can't fault it and would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient”
Reviews.Author: GeneTS
Reviews.Content: Convenient to the airport bus drop off/pick up location and near shopping and restaurants. Within walking distance to most attractions.

HotelInfo.Name: Regencia Colon Hotel
